modName: Forsworn and Blackblood and Boethiah Tattoos 2k
summary: High Resolution texture set replacing the Forsworn male and female tattoo sets with 2k war paints, also replaces Blackblood tattoos and adds the unplayable Boethiah tattoo as a replacer for the sixth dark elf warpaint.
descriptionHtml:
This is simply a texture replacer mod that gives the male and female Forsworn tattoos a 2k highres version, as well as the Blackblood tattoos. I recommend the latest version of Racemenu for the best level of warpaint customization for your character, as well as the use of SKSE and adding the line "iTintTextureResolution=2048" under [Display] in your skse.ini

I find that these tints are often left out of highres warpaint replacers entirely so this is my attempt at rectifying that.

Also, since the sixth dark elf warpaint for both genders is my absolute least favorite and I've always wanted to make the unplayable Boethiah cultist tattoo playable, I made a highres Boethiah tattoo for both genders and it replaces that sixth dark elf warpaint. An improvement, in my humble opinion.

Please see the images I have uploaded for a good look at the new paints and feel free to upload your own if you like them!

Tools used: Paint.net
author: evgirunslaad
